text:
“In those days after that tribulation the sun will be darkened & the moon will not give its light & the stars will be falling from the sky & the powers in the heavens will be shaken & then they will see the Son of Man coming in the clouds with great power & glory”

Mark 13:24-26

RT @FaceTheNation SUNDAY: @RandPaul 

Our other guests ➡️ https://www.cbsnews.com/news/sunday-paul-cummings-ernst-crenshaw-houlahan-haaland-neguse/?ftag=CNM-00-10aab7b&linkId=59760751 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsKTuh6XgAEzlEK.jpg

RT @CBSNews Sen. Rand Paul tells @FaceTheNation he thinks the Trump administration should cancel arms deals with Saudi Arabia to send a message about Jamal Khashoggi's killing: "The only thing they understand over there is strength" https://www.cbsnews.com/news/sunday-paul-cummings-ernst-crenshaw-houlahan-haaland-neguse/ http://pbs.twimg.com/amplify_video_thumb/1064182805058514944/img/fhTOPlo3OB3n4VEX.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1064182805058514944/vid/320x180/lrUQ2XfemGr7E1Xu.mp4?tag=9

On #FirstStepAct "With @realDonaldTrump being in favor of this criminal justice reform...really it only depends on one Senator now. If @McConnellPress will allow a vote, it gets 65-70 votes in the Senate, it will be one of the most popular things to ever pass."

RT @WeDemandJustice Nancy Pelosi has been in the trenches with us in the fight against Trump's assault on the rule of law. Demand Justice is proud to support her bid to be our next Speaker of the House. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsJmlW1X4AA9Sbl.jpg

I'll be joining @FaceTheNation shortly, be sure to tune in! https://twitter.com/CBSNews/status/1064179173021884417 QT @CBSNews .@FaceTheNation starts now. This week's guests include @RandPaul, @RepCummings, @SenJoniErnst and a panel with newly-elected Congress members @DanCrenshawTX, @Deb4CongressNM, @HoulahanForPa and @JoeNeguse https://www.cbsnews.com/news/sunday-paul-cummings-ernst-crenshaw-houlahan-haaland-neguse/?ftag=CNM-00-10aab7e&linkId=59813224 http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsS5UU_XcAETss0.jpg

Thank you, Kristin @rowefinkbeiner for your support and for all that you and @MomsRising do to advocate on behalf of families and children. I look forward to working with you in the next Congress. Love you back! – NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsS3OVIU4AAjtes.jpg

Thank you @AlmaForCongress for your support and leadership on education. I look forward to serving with you and to advancing our shared commitment to HBCUs and agenda for strengthening public schools. –NP  #ForThePeople http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsTA59RUwAAiCxG.jpg

RT @CSEA_Now California School Employees Association, @AFLCIO, representing 240,000 CA classified school employees, supports @NancyPelosi as Speaker of the House. @CSEA_Now urges @HouseDemocrats and Congress to elect her as Speaker and as a champion for working men and women everywhere.
Andrew Gillum ran a great progressive campaign. He has transformed politics in Florida and is a key player in the political revolution we are waging.

RT @ABC7 SO SWEET❤️: 7-year-old who lost home in #WoolseyFire now holding toy drive for other kids affected by massive blaze, "I know how it feels"
https://abc7.com/society/7-year-old-holding-toy-drive-for-kids-affected-by-woolsey-fire/4704964/ http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsLySynUUAAMwd3.jpg

The middle class is the backbone of our democracy. It’s an honor to receive the support of @SEIU who, along with many partners and allies, work tirelessly to lift up America’s working families. —NP http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsTICmOUUAA9_Bh.jpg
RT @AndrewGillum It has been an incredible honor to compete in this historic gubernatorial cycle with @staceyabrams and @BenJealous! Onward!!! http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsKM3l2XoAE0gBR.jpg

RT @FaceTheNation .@RandPaul believes there is a “real chance” to pass criminal justice reform in the Senate. http://pbs.twimg.com/ext_tw_video_thumb/1064188360414150658/pu/img/Xdug_Uut7kUeKf83.jpg https://video.twimg.com/ext_tw_video/1064188360414150658/pu/vid/320x180/oIokPGKvAH6sEI3W.mp4?tag=6

RT @AdyBarkan Today I’m excited to endorse @NancyPelosi for Speaker of the House of Representatives.

It’s really important that all progressives push to elect her in the coming weeks, for 3 good reasons.

Short thread below.

Agree! Let’s pass it as soon as we return. #FirstStepAct https://twitter.com/chuckgrassley/status/1063546014152429568 QT @ChuckGrassley DEALMAKER @realDonaldTrump can get a big bipartisan deal done THIS YEAR on crim justice reform Plenty of time to pass First Step Act in December Will GOP senators & Ldr McConnell stand in Pres Trump’s way of achieving major bipartisan victory or join in historic + popular reform?

Rand Paul on "Face the Nation" says Saudi Arabia considers sanctions for Khashoggi killing a "sign of weakness" - CBS News https://www.cbsnews.com/news/rand-paul-on-face-the-nation-says-saudi-arabia-considers-sanctions-for-khashoggi-killing-a-sign-of-weakness/
Evidence is overwhelming' that Saudi crown prince was involved in Khashoggi murder https://thehill.com/homenews/sunday-talk-shows/417320-rand-paul-evidence-is-overwhelming-that-saudi-crown-prince-was

Today I’m headed to Butte County, California to meet with firefighters, local officials, and evacuees impacted by the Camp Fire, now the deadliest and most destructive fire in our state’s history. We must do all we can to support ongoing response efforts.

RT @ElenaHung202 ✔ Passed the ACA, ensuring those with pre-existing conditions have coverage & no lifetime cap on care
✔ Took back the House, protecting the ACA from further GOP repeal efforts
There's no one else I trust more than @NancyPelosi as Speaker to #ProtectOurCare & fight #ForThePeople http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsIa_g1WsAEE35_.jpg

Racial discrimination also exists in computer algorithms. A recent study found that Black and Latino consumers pay more when it comes to home mortgage interest rates, no matter whether they do it in person or online. 
https://twitter.com/washpostbiz/status/1062765237646974976 QT @washpostbiz Are you a minority borrower? You might want to think twice about using an online lender. https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/are-you-a-minority-borrower-you-might-want-to-think-twice-about-using-an-online-lender/2018/11/14/af59fe97-f13b-4465-b352-c49b6d29bb17_story.html?tid=sm_tw_biz

Thank you, @CWAUnion, for your strong support. We are ready to work with you to advance economic justice and stop the flood of corporate dollars degrading our democratic process. -NP #ForThePeople http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsT-bYrVYAAeQUz.jpg

The Camp Fire is the deadliest in California’s history, claiming over 70 lives. Thousands of homes have been destroyed. More than 1,000 people are still missing. And the fire continues.

Now’s the time to come together. Find out how you can help here: https://californiavolunteers.ca.gov/camp-fire/

Today I visited Paradise, CA to see the devastation for myself. My heart breaks for those who lost loved ones, those who are still searching, and for those families who lost everything in the fire. Thank you to our firefighters who continue to work tirelessly. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsUNu80WoAA7XL9.jpg
My statement on Senator Nelson’s concession in the Florida Senate race: http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsUIwdVX4AI8oG6.jpg

The Camp Fire evacuees need our help. Please consider checking out this list with various ways to help your fellow neighbors: https://sacramento.cbslocal.com/help-2
https://twitter.com/latimes/status/1063334614285062145 QT @latimes Made homeless by flames, the Camp fire evacuees face hardship, disease and desperation http://www.latimes.com/local/lanow/la-me-ln-camp-fire-evacuee-desperation-20181115-story.html

No two Senators had a better working relationship than Senator Nelson & I. We often voted differently,but not once did it interfere with our ability to work together. He served with a decency & dignity that is increasingly rare in politics. 

I will miss working with him

#Sayfie https://twitter.com/nelsonforsenate/status/1064248125198663681 QT @NelsonForSenate Well, things turned out a little differently than we had hoped, but I by no means feel defeated. That’s because I’ve had the privilege of serving the people of Florida for most of my life. It’s been a rewarding journey and a very humbling experience. No one could be more blessed. http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsTj0YXXQAU4ezE.jpg https://video.twimg.com/amplify_video/1064192797492813826/vid/320x180/GI5Ehpw9F-zj8fjL.mp4?tag=10

RT @SenSanders Apply for spring internships in Senator Sanders' Vermont and Washington DC offices. The deadline to apply is Sunday, Nov. 18. See here for more information: https://www.sanders.senate.gov/services/internships
@NewNowNext @NancyPelosi We must.

Thank you, @ElenaHung202, for your support. Your tireless advocacy through @LittleLobbyists and @HealthCareVoter is a main reason we won this battle together to protect our health care. —NP #ForThePeople http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsUpNI2VAAEZxTr.jpg

RT @MSNBC "Let us be bold not timid. Let us show the American people that we are on their side," said Sen. Bernie Sanders during a sit down with Rev. Al Sharpton about the midterm election results. https://trib.al/Xse47Q0

The Walton family owns more wealth than the bottom 40% of Americans. Meanwhile, 55% of Walmart’s associates are food insecure. If Walmart can afford $20 billion for stock buybacks, it can afford to raise the pay of its workers to a living wage. https://www.theguardian.com/us-news/2018/nov/17/bernie-sanders-stop-walmart-act-ceo-pay-low-wages

The LIFT Act would reform the tax code to help those who actually need it — not the rich and powerful.
https://www.washingtonpost.com/business/2018/11/15/almost-all-sen-harriss-trillion-tax-plan-would-help-middle-working-class-study-finds/

Losing even one of our firefighters is a tragedy. We have to keep them safe. That's why I pushed to pass a bipartisan law creating a national cancer registry to collect better data – & better protect our firefighters. And I'll keep pushing for new measures to help them. https://twitter.com/bostonherald/status/1063038954797187072 QT @bostonherald Firefighters renew calls for safety after 7 active duty deaths in 3 weeks http://www.bostonherald.com/news/local_coverage/2018/11/firefighters_renew_calls_for_safety?utm_campaign=socialflow&utm_content=tw-bostonherald&utm_source=twitter.com&utm_medium=social http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsCsS7BXQAEyieA.jpg

We must end the international embarrassment of the United States being the only major country on earth, the only one, which does not guarantee workers paid medical and family leave, paid sick time and paid vacation time.
No matter what community you live in, from Parkland to Chicago to South Los Angeles, no one is immune from the gun violence epidemic. There have been too many tragedies. We need Congress to act.

Congratulations @UNITEHERE26 on this hard fought victory. Hotel workers stood strong for more than six weeks in the wind, the rain, and the snow, up against the largest hotel company in the world and won. https://www.nbcboston.com/news/local/Tentative-Agreement-Reached-Between-Marriott-Unite-Here-26-Union-500751531.html

Thank you, #ILWU, for your support. I look forward to working with you to advance progressive policy that benefits workers and promotes economic security for them and their families. -NP #ForThePeople http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsVVtl5XgAEPoi4.jpg

Most Americans know all too well the rising costs of prescription drugs. And it couldn’t be more clear that this Administration failed at keeping these costs down. 
https://www.politico.com/story/2018/11/16/pfizer-drugs-prices-increase-trump-981010

RT @chiproytx 19 years ago today, Texas Aggie Bonfire collapsed, killing 11 students & 1 former student. We remember the lives lost & their loved ones in our prayers today while we also celebrate the great traditions that have long brought us together.  #GigEm cc: @carrahroy @GovernorPerry http://pbs.twimg.com/media/DsUzyaaVsAAXmtq.jpg
